Package me.lokka30.microlib.other

Class VersionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.lokka30.microlib.other.VersionUtils
  • public class VersionUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to check the major minecraft version of the server. It does this by checking if the server accepts required blocks or entities that were added in these updates.
    Since:
    MicroLib 2.2.0

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  VersionUtils.MajorMinecraftVersion
      This enum contains all major Minecraft versions (1.6 and newer).

    • Method Detail

      • getMajorMinecraftVersion

        public static VersionUtils.MajorMinecraftVersion getMajorMinecraftVersion()
        If possible, use one of the individual methods e.g. isOneTwelve(), since they are quicker calculations.
        Returns:
        the latest supported MajorMinecraftVersion by MicroLib. It will return UNKNOWN if the server is older than 1.6.
        Since:
        unknown
        See Also:
        VersionUtils.MajorMinecraftVersion

      • isOneEighteen

        public static boolean isOneEighteen()
        Returns:
        if the server is MC 1.18 or newer.

      • isRunningSpigot

        public static boolean isRunningSpigot()
        Returns:
        if the server is running SpigotMC or any SpigotMC derivative such as PaperMC and Tuinity.
        Since:
        unknown
